channel.title: Toggling internal frames' visibility [java]
channel.description:
i'm currently working on a user interface with multiple internal frames.
i have a feature in mind, but i'm not sure if it's possible / how i can get it done.
i want to be able to toggle the visibility of certain internal frames, and once done so - resize the other frames to compensate for the space.
if the resizing isn't possible, i would like to 'show/hide' on the frames without reinstancing it. so that if a text area has data in it, and hidden, when it reappears it isnt empty - etc.
